title: RTX 2070 Explained - NVIDIA Wants HOW MUCH For This!?
description: The RTX 2070 is considered NVIDIA's most "affordable" RTX-series graphics card yet.  But the Founders Edition is still $600 which is A LOT of money.  In this video we take a closer look at this card, its specifications and potential performance.     CORRECTION:  Our chart showed the GTX 1070 to have the GP106 core.  This was a typing error.  As mention in the video, it actually uses the same GP104 core from the 1070 Ti / 1080.    Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Cooler Master MK750:   HD58X Headphones:    Subscribe    This video is sponsored by Cooler Master and Massdrop. As per HWC guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer.
